channel.title: Road to Max Stats
channel.description:
I've always wanted to be maxed on RuneScape, so I've finally decided to stop wanting and start trying. This will be the official thread for my road to max stats and possibly other achievements. I will try to add a log for every day to show what I did that day and maybe even plan future goals.
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122084602/runescape/images/thumb/5/51/Attack-icon.png/21px-Attack-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Attack[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 75[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122083450/runescape/images/thumb/3/3e/Strength-icon.png/16px-Strength-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Strength[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 70[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123003536/runescape/images/thumb/d/d8/Defence-icon.png/18px-Defence-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Defence[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 79[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122082216/runescape/images/thumb/7/72/Ranged-icon.png/21px-Ranged-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Ranged[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 76[/b][/li] [li][b]Plan to chin at Ape Atoll during double experience weekend.[/b][/li][/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121220331/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Prayer[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 60[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122182528/runescape/images/thumb/7/77/Magic-icon.png/21px-Magic-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Magic[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 75[/b][/li] [li][b]Progressively working towards 85. (For Slayer tasks that adapt with magic)[/b][/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122193809/runescape/images/thumb/1/1d/Constitution-icon.png/21px-Constitution-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Constitution[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 77[/b][/li] [li]None.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231156/runescape/images/thumb/4/48/Crafting-icon.png/21px-Crafting-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Crafting[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 60[/b][/li] [li]None.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122191028/runescape/images/thumb/2/28/Mining-icon.png/21px-Mining-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Mining[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 60[/b][/li] [li]None.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122232122/runescape/images/thumb/d/df/Smithing-icon.png/21px-Smithing-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Smithing[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 68[/b][/li] [li]None.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120123002212/runescape/images/thumb/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png/21px-Fishing-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Fishing[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 54[/b][/li] [li]None.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233049/runescape/images/thumb/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png/17px-Cooking-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Cooking[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 77[/b][/li] [li]None.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214504/runescape/images/thumb/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png/18px-Firemaking-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Firemaking[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 99[/b][/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122222711/runescape/images/thumb/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png/18px-Woodcutting-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Woodcutting[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 99[/b][/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122223429/runescape/images/thumb/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png/20px-Runecrafting-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Runecrafting[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 50[/b][/li] [li]None.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120207171723/runescape/images/thumb/3/3e/Dungeoneering-icon.png/21px-Dungeoneering-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Dungeoneering[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 13[/b][/li] [li][b]Currently working on getting level 50.[/b][/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122221425/runescape/images/thumb/8/84/Agility-icon.png/18px-Agility-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Agility[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 50[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122235048/runescape/images/thumb/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png/21px-Herblore-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Herblore[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 50[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122201602/runescape/images/thumb/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png/21px-Thieving-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Thieving[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 53[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122200319/runescape/images/thumb/7/77/Fletching-icon.png/21px-Fletching-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Fletching[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 51[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121214707/runescape/images/thumb/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png/19px-Slayer-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Slayer[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 62[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122213351/runescape/images/thumb/f/f0/Farming-icon.png/21px-Farming-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Farming[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 51[/b][/li] [li]None.[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122233806/runescape/images/thumb/e/e5/Construction-icon.png/21px-Construction-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Construction[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 55[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120122231407/runescape/images/8/83/Hunter-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Hunter[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 70[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
[img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120121220228/runescape/images/thumb/e/e3/Summoning-icon.png/19px-Summoning-icon.png[/img] [size=4]Summoning[/size]
[ul] [li][b]Level: 61[/b][/li] [li]None[/li][/ul]
All of the skills have been documented above, including the level and current tasks I'm working on for that certain skill or achievement; however, the main task(s) I'm working on can be found below:
[ul][li]Getting all skills to at least level 50. (Dungeoneering)[/li] [li]Obtaining barrow gloves. (Desert Treasure, 10 Quest Points)[/li][/ul]

item.title: Road to Max Stats
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

I’m sorry I haven’t been updating this post for a few days; I’ve been working very hard when I do have the time for RS, so I haven’t been active on this forum due to that. I’ll work on updating all my stats after I finish this slayer task.

Read full topic

item.title: Road to Max Stats
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

it’s around the 90’s it get’s tough to keep pushing forward, just keep your goals straight and you will get there in no time, just remember lol my account is 1 year old and it’s getting up there lol 2 years old and i’d probably have a max cape.

Read full topic

item.title: Road to Max Stats
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:19, topic:465207”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=570029.msg4139670#msg4139670 date=1352033700]

Training gets boring once all of your skills are 80+.

I personally believe 90+. 80s aren’t that bad.
[/quote]I have 81 hunter and I want to kill myself

Talk to this guy. He’s part to the anti-suicide movement![/quote]irrelevant message is irrelevant :hurr:

Read full topic

item.title: Road to Max Stats
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:14, topic:465207"]I will look at this thread 1 year from now and see if you are 2.1k+ total yet.

Best of luck.[/quote]
I will try my best. I’m currently just trying to get some requirements for quests and things to make leveling a bit easier. Thank you for the support.

Edit: I got a decent amount of experience during the double experience, but I had to work everyday, so it wasn’t extremely ideal. I also managed to get a few quests done so I can speed up training methods.

Read full topic

item.description:

Best of luck.
